component.text: Verify the OSPF MD5 Authentication Settings of R1
Verify the OSPF MD5 Authentication on R2

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Verify the enabling of OSPF MD5 authentication on R2 by filtering 'show ip ospf interface' command to display only the 'Message' portion of the output.

command.correctresponse: show ip ospf interface | include Message
command.deviceresponse:
Message digest authentication enabled
Message digest authentication enabled
Message digest authentication enabled
R2#
command.instruction: Verify the routing table is complete by displaying only the OSPF routes.

command.deviceresponse:
Codes: L - local, C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, M - 
mobile, B - BGP
       D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external, O - OSPF, IA - OSPF 
inter area 
       N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA 
external type 2
       E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external 
type 2
       i - IS-IS, su - IS-IS summary, L1 - IS-IS level-1, 
L2 - IS-IS level-2
       ia - IS-IS inter area, * - candidate default, 
U - per-user static route
       o - ODR, P - periodic downloaded static route, H - NHRP, 
l - LISP
       + - replicated route, % - next hop override

Gateway of last resort is 209.165.200.226 to network 0.0.0.0

      172.16.0.0/16 is variably subnetted, 5 subnets, 3 masks
O        172.16.1.0/24 [110/65] via 172.16.3.1, 00:46:13, 
Serial0/0/0
O     192.168.1.0/24 [110/65] via 192.168.10.10, 00:43:50, 
Serial0/0/1
      192.168.10.0/24 is variably subnetted, 3 subnets, 2 masks
O        192.168.10.4/30 [110/128] via 192.168.10.10, 00:43:50, 
Serial0/0/1
                         [110/128] via 172.16.3.1, 00:46:13, 
Serial0/0/0
R2#
command.instruction: You are now logged into R3. Verify the enabling of OSPF MD5 authentication by filtering 'show ip ospf interface' command to display only the 'Message' portion of the output.

command.correctresponse: show ip ospf interface | include Message
command.deviceresponse:
Message digest authentication enabled
Message digest authentication enabled
Message digest authentication enabled
R3#
command.instruction: Verify the routing table is complete by displaying only the OSPF routes.

command.deviceresponse:
Codes: L - local, C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, M - 
mobile, B - BGP
       D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external, O - OSPF, IA - OSPF 
inter area 
       N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA 
external type 2
       E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external type 2
       i - IS-IS, su - IS-IS summary, L1 - IS-IS level-1, 
L2 - IS-IS level-2
       ia - IS-IS inter area, * - candidate default, 
U - per-user static route
       o - ODR, P - periodic downloaded static route, H - NHRP, 
l - LISP
       + - replicated route, % - next hop override

Gateway of last resort is 209.165.200.226 to network 0.0.0.0

O*E2  0.0.0.0/0 [110/1] via 192.168.10.9, 00:01:54, 
Serial0/0/1
      172.16.0.0/16 is variably subnetted, 3 subnets, 2 masks
O        172.16.1.0/24 [110/65] via 192.168.10.5, 00:01:59, 
Serial0/0/0
O        172.16.2.0/24 [110/65] via 192.168.10.9, 00:01:54, 
Serial0/0/1
O        172.16.3.0/30 [110/128] via 192.168.10.9, 00:01:54, 
Serial0/0/1
                       [110/128] via 192.168.10.5, 00:01:59, 
Serial0/0/0
R3#
command.instruction: You successfully verified OSPF MD5 authentication for R2 and R3.
